price: Haciye imyaka itari mike rero, ni ho benewabo na Yusufu bashengera muri Misiri bomowe n’amapfa yabateye, maze binjira kwa Yusufu, na we aca arabamenya ariko bobo ntibamumenya bivanye n’igihe kitari gito cari giheze;
arabic: وَجَآءَ إِخۡوَةُ يُوسُفَ فَدَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَعَرَفَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

meta.transliteration: wajāa ikh'watu yūsufa fadakhalū ʿalayhi faʿarafahum wahum lahu munkirūna
